title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running LLMs locally with a REST API and CLI.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, enabling programmatic chat, generate, embed, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, supporting Node.js and browser environments.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, providing LLM, Chat, and Embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama supporting chat, model management, RAG, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama with fluent API design, supporting chat, generate, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG implementation using Ollama for embeddings and generation with Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-chat-shell
summary: Bash script providing an interactive chat interface to Ollama models via curl.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into the editor as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models in any Discord server.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper for Ollama with prompt templates, conversation history, and output formatting.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat UI for Ollama with streaming responses and model selection sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU support and PVC model caching.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service inside a pipeline for CI-based LLM tasks.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Chroma, and Nginx for a full local AI playground.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package definition for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS and macOS.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt desktop client for Ollama with chat history and model management.

title: ollama-rag-langchain
summary: End-to-end RAG template using Ollama embeddings, Chroma, and LangChain with FastAPI backend.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot leveraging Ollama for on-demand LLM responses with thread-aware context.
